landingAppDescription: Your simple, AI-powered team chat app.
authDescription: We use simple authentication model, no login and password, just email which will be used for quick code confirmation.
confirmDescription: We have sent a 6-digit confirmation code to {email}. It will expire shortly, so enter it soon.
confirmExpire: Confirmation code expires in a {seconds} seconds
createTeamDescription: Create a brand-new workspace for you and your team.
exploreTeamsDescription: Find and join your team` existing workspace or any free community.
